alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 5:02AM PDT until March 30 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches between 4,000 and 5,000 feet. Total snow accumulations from 6 to `12 inches above 5,000 feet. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 11 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
